document.full_text: johnson & johnson is in talks to buy swiss medical device maker synthes for $20 billion, according to a report on the wall street journal website, citing people familiar with the matter.
document.title: j&j in talks to buy synthes for $20 billion: report
lines_and_colors: johnson & johnson is in talks to buy swiss medical device maker synthes for $20 billion, according to a report on the wall street journal website, citing people familiar with the matter.
